name: Scrambled Eggsercise
description:
Oh my! Henryette can't stop laying eggs!

In this cheerful game you play as the disembodied hand of an omnipresent ghost farmer (wait what?) as you grab Henryette's eggs and put them in boxes (or not... if the cat has anything to say about it).

How many can you get?

This, dear reader, is my first game prototype! Hope you find it fun!

I created it over a week as an assignment for the Create With Code course in Unity Learn. It's not without its limitations, but I am really happy with the result so I decided to share my first step into the gamedev world with the community.

Honestly, if you read/played, thank you so much! You made my day, I wish you a nice day too :)

Credits:

Out of respect for the kind creators that made whose free assets I used, here they are in no particular order (besides alphabetical... which is a "particular" order, but oh well, you understand what I mean):

  • 2D Atlas Speech bubbles Alphabet Numbers
  • Candy & Conquer
  • Cartoon Game Sound
  • Cartoon Farm Crops
  • Free Casual SoundFX Pack
  • Food Icons Pack
  • Free Crowd Cheering Sounds
  • Free Chibi Cat
  • RPG Essentials Sound Effects
  • Low Poly Farm Pack Lite
  • Meshtint Free Chicken Mega Toon Series
  • Versatile Game Sound Effects
